token.notarget: You should select a target. default shortcut => T

apply.Button: Apply damage of the result on
apply.noTarget: You should select a target to apply damages or critical

active.label: Apply damage and critial options
active.hint: Add a dialog after weapon test to apply damage or critical to a target.

netDamage.label: Display the amount of damage
netDamage.hint: If set the exact amount of damage is displayed in the chat. If not set an estimation of damage is diplayed.

apply_critical.label: Apply critical injury to target
apply_critical.notApply: <small>The injury was not apply automatically. don't forget to add to the actor sheet</small><hr>

critical.tokenIsMinion: One member of the group is dead

ffg-star-wars-utilities.dice-helperOverride-hint: Add suggestions for all skills for the feature 'dice_helper' from the module 'StarWarsFFG_Enhancements'
